backend/announcements.mo: Manages announcements with admin‑restricted create/edit functions and retrieval of single or all announcements stored in a Map.
backend/blog.mo: Implements blog posts, comments, reactions, and tips with creation, editing, deletion, and authorization checks stored in state Maps.
backend/main.mo: Defines core Phil3 backend actor including user profiles, elections, consensus meetings, tokenomics, join requests, and storage integrations.
backend/notifications.mo: Handles notification creation, read‑status updates, and fetching user notifications using a Map‑based state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a specific login page text update and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app with main.tsx.
frontend/index.ts: Contains a conditional determining when to show a leave‑community button.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper with authentication flow, profile loading logic, global providers, and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/CopyAddressButto: Button component that copies a provided address to the clipboard using the Clipboard API or a fallback and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AdminT: Admin dashboard tab for managing UCA text, meetings, join requests, member admin actions, and user deletions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Announ: Dialog for creating or editing announcements using a rich text editor, with validation and localized messages.
Displays announcements with admin-only creation/editing, sorting, previews, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/BlogPo: Empty file placeholder for a blog post dialog component.
Empty file placeholder for viewing a blog post.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/BlogTa: Empty file placeholder for blog-related dashboard tab.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consen: Renders detailed controls and status for a consensus meeting, including phase transitions, signup, timers, and forms for contributions or rankings.
Lists active and past consensus meetings, allows signup, and opens detailed meeting views if permitted.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contri: Lets a user submit contribution text and files for a consensus meeting, showing group members and handling uploads.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Counci: Displays council dashboard data and actions, enabling eligible users to propose, approve, and recalculate council actions with various loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyR: Displays daily reward eligibility, user category info, and claim actions with cooldown and error handling logic.
Provides an admin interface to view and edit daily reward configuration values, with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Docume: Renders an in-app documentation browser with searchable sections, topics, and localized content.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Donate: Allows users to donate PHIL tokens to other users or treasuries with validation, confirmation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditPr: Modal dialog for editing a user's profile, supporting username, bio, and profile picture upload with preview and validation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditTo: Dialog component allowing admins to update the tokenomics launch date by selecting a date and time and submitting it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Meetin: Displays consensus meeting results, calculating expected REP and PHIL rewards and showing rankings, user rewards, and summary cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Member: Shows member list with search, join request approval, and role-based access checks for admins and active members.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Overview page presenting user profile, membership status, balances, category badges, and dialogs for editing, UCA acceptance, and leaving the community.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Propos: Manages proposal creation, approval, rejection, and displays proposals with permission checks for active members, admins, and council members.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Rankin: Interactive form for ranking group members, displaying contributions and submitting ordered rankings to the backend.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Regist: Empty file placeholder for a candidate registration dialog.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Tokeno: Displays tokenomics metrics for authorized users, including supply, treasury balances, mint cycle status, and halving data.
Admin-focused tokenomics management tab showing supply metrics, treasury data, minting status, and allowing manual minting and config edits.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/UCADia: Dialog for viewing and accepting the User Contribution Agreement, requiring confirmation before submission.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Wallet: Empty file placeholder for a wallet-related dashboard tab.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Weekly: Card showing 12-week REP history, latest balance, averages, and a detailed weekly breakdown.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text with localized strings and a heart icon linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main header with language switcher, theme toggle, notifications, and user profile dropdown including logout and admin options.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown to switch between supported locales, showing flags and labels for available languages.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsDro: Dropdown listing unread notifications with timestamps, allowing marking single or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides locale state, translation lookup, and language switching via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, covering user profiles, UCA actions, membership, and other domain data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenPrices.ts: Empty placeholder file for future token price fetching logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, theming, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Implements locale storage and helpers for formatting dates, numbers, and pluralization for English and French.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines the structured translation keys and interfaces used throughout the application for internationalized UI text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with role‑based tab visibility and localized UI, using multiple feature tabs and loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login landing page with hero text, value propositions, and an Internet Identity login button with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Provides a profile creation form with image upload, validation, and submission to save the user's profile.
frontend/src/pages/UCAAcceptancePage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/types/backend-extensions.ts: Defines extended backend-related TypeScript interfaces and enums not exported by the generated backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requests, and configuration for the Phil3 platform.
